{{also|干吗}}
==Chinese==

===Etymology 1===
{{zh-forms|s=干吗|alt=幹嘛,幹麼}}
{{zh-l|*幹|to do}} + {{zh-l|*嗎|(''dialectal Mandarin, e.g. [[Tianjin]]'') what}}. Colloquial; the formal equivalent in Standard Mandarin is {{zh-l|[[做]][[什麼]]}} or {{zh-l|[[幹]][[什麼]]}}.

The second element is cognate with {{zh-l|*麼|tr=me}} in Standard Mandarin {{zh-l|什麼|what}}, and is usually written as {{zh-l|*嘛}} when writing Tianjin dialect. Dictionaries only consider consider toneless ''ma'' (''declarative particle'') as the only proper use of {{zh-l|*嘛}}. All other senses, including the dialectally influenced pronunciation of ''má'' ("what") and the interrogative particle of ''ma'', are considered incorrect. However, there is much confusion in actual writing, possibly with {{zh-l|*幹嘛}} being used more commonly for this sense.

====Pronunciation====
{{zh-pron
|m=gànmá,gàmá,gàimá,2n=Beijing dialect,3n=Beijing dialect
|mn=xm,zz:kàn-ma
|cat=v,adv
}}

====Verb====
{{zh-verb}}

# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} what is (someone) doing; what is going on
#: {{zh-x|你 現在 '''幹{gàn}嗎{má}''' 呢？|What are you doing now?}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} what is wrong; what is up
#: {{zh-x|你 '''幹{gàn}嗎{má}''' 呀？|What's up with you?}}

====Adverb====
{{zh-adv}}

# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[why]]; [[why on earth]]; [[whatever]] [[for]]
#: {{zh-x|你 '''幹{gàn}嗎{má}''' 折磨 自己 啊！|Why are you torturing yourself?}}
